timeline.message: Convert NetworkManagerHolder accessor to a bridge.

timeline.bodyText: Can use the PhaseTracker as is now. But if this whole class shebang is usable from multiple threads, you may have to change the map used to at least ConcurrentHashMap.
timeline.author: gabizou

replies.bodyText:
Depends where you call this in the lifecycle.
Part of the lifecycle is before the engine(s) are even created. If so, cannot use PhaseTracker.
Even if you could, don't see a point. We explicitly know what the cause will always be here, no reason to grab one from the CauseStack.
replies.author: Zidane

timeline.bodyText: Does asMap render the cache as invalid? Haven't read the javadoc on caffeine in a moment, but I'd figure it would make a copy as a Map.
timeline.author: gabizou

replies.bodyText: asMap returns a view of the cache
replies.author: Cybermaxke
